Summary: bright 50ft diameter lights hovering.watched it move off into space
divs: sighting detailsdriving on hwy 530 west into silvana..turn left on larson rd. just past the lutheran church we noticed 2 lights above the hill we were driving towards.about 1 mile away. as we make our way up the first curve, i say to my 15 year old.. "those lights are strange".."yes, i noticed them too, down by the church." she says. the lights were closer to us..or we were closer to them. they had not moved. we were thinking it was a plane, or helicopter. i am driving about 2-3 mph. still keeping an eye on the lights\road. they are about 50-100ft above us..we can only see the very bright lights. they have a "cloud-like" or fog likeness around each light.these lights are huge,,guessing no less than 50ft in diameter. my daughter says, "it doesn't have any wings." i say,"yah,,i know". we are now at the top of the hill making a sharp left. it still hovering. moves(glides) a bit then back. we stop in the road to watch it totally. we put down our windows to hear,,thinking we will be able to identify the motor. no noise! total silence! i say to my daughter, it's not making a noise, no engine.we still cannot make out a shape,,,only the oddest, brightest, lights. we watch as it begins to move off to the sse the two lights become one light in the back...it is going to out of our sight..so we move to a clear space in the road about 50 feet south. it comes into view again,,then as fast as you can process what your are seeing,...it jets sse in a very vertical way. we watch it as it begins to look just like a star in the sky...before it disapears. it is the way that it left, i turn to my daughter and say, "i think we just saw a ufo" she says, "yah! i know...cool!"......
trends: there has been one other sighting in silvana\arlington
there was one other sighting in silvana\arlington on or around february 13th 2008
